title: A Creative's Guide To NFTs, Social Tokens, and Web3 with Mason Nystrom
description: What are NFTs, how do they work, and why should you care? In this episode, we invite Mason Nystrom, a Research Analyst at Messari, to help us understand the NFTs, social tokens, and Web3. We walk through the potential impact it has on creatives, and why and how to get involved in minting your own digital art.
dc:creator: How You Create
